Class Economy

java.lang.Object
bet.astral.stream.economy.Economy
All Implemented Interfaces:
EconomyWrapperPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CurrencyEconomy
public abstract class Economy extends Object implements EconomyWrapperPlayer
Economy provided by an economy provider

1.0.0
